user.description:
Enter your GoTo SMS API credentials to enable SMS notifications in Home Assistant.

**Prerequisites:**
- GoTo account with SMS capabilities
- API credentials from your GoTo developer portal
- GoTo Authentication package installed

**Need help?** Check the [documentation]({docs_url}) or [setup guide]({setup_url}).
user.title: SMS GoTo Configuration

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to GoTo API. Please check your credentials and ensure the GoTo Authentication package is installed.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please verify your API Key, API Secret, and Account SID.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
error.missing_dependency: GoTo Authentication package not found. Please install it first: pip install git+https://github.com/oneofthegeeks/GoTo-Authentication.git

abort.already_configured: SMS GoTo is already configured. You can only have one instance.
